description: Broadband availability data submitted to the National Telecommunications and Information  Administration (NTIA) on October 1, 2013 from State Broadband Initiative grantees in every state, Territory and the District of Columbia. This data is current as of June 30, 2013. For more information regarding the Grantees please visit http://www2.ntia.doc.gov/SBDD
